trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Wheaton
There were no other sightings in Wheaton on or around February 23rd 2008
Summary: bright white (LED looking) pea sized light at thumbs distance
divs: Sighting DetailsLight shot at constant level across the sky from east to west at extreme high rate of speed. No tail, lost sight in tree line. Was traveling with the horizion, NOT Falling out of the sky. What could this have been??? 1.) Driving home 2.) bright light came out of the tree line 3.) a plane at first, but then it didn't make sense at the speed it was going. 4.) Traveling at high rate of speed ACROSS the horizon. 5.) I was stunned 6.) It disappeared into the tree line to the west.
